verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G1161"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s fellow workers, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w appeal|strong="G3870"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* loving kindness \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – ‘\w At|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* acceptance \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w listened|strong="G1873"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w deliverance|strong="G4991"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* helped \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.’ \w Now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* acceptance! \w Now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w deliverance|strong="G4991"\w*!

\w Never|strong="G3361"\w* \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w we|strong="G2443"\w* \w put|strong="G1325"\w* \w an|strong="G1722"\w* obstacle \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3367"\w*’s \w way|strong="G1722"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w fault|strong="G3469"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G3361"\w* found \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G1722"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w No|strong="G3956"\w*, \w we|strong="G5613"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* trying \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w circumstances|strong="G1722"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s assistants \w should|strong="G2316"\w* – \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w an|strong="G1722"\w* hour \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w endurance|strong="G5281"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w troubles|strong="G2347"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* hardships, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w difficulties|strong="G4730"\w*,

\w in|strong="G1722"\w* floggings, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w imprisonments|strong="G5438"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* riots, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* toils, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* sleepless nights, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w hunger|strong="G3521"\w*;

\w by|strong="G1722"\w* purity, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* kindliness, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* holiness \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* unfeigned love;

\w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* truth, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* left;

amid \w honor|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* disrepute, amid \w slander|strong="G1426"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w praise|strong="G1391"\w*; regarded \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w deceivers|strong="G4108"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* proved \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* true;

\w as|strong="G5613"\w* unknown, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w well-known|strong="G1921"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w at|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2289"\w*’s door, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w*, \w see|strong="G3708"\w*, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* chastised, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w killed|strong="G2289"\w*;

\w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w saddened|strong="G3076"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* enriching \w many|strong="G4183"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w possessing|strong="G2722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*! The Apostle and his Converts

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* been speaking freely \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, dear friends \w in|strong="G4314"\w* Corinth; \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w opened|strong="G4115"\w* \w our|strong="G4314"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*;

\w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* room \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* room, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* love, \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w*.

\w Can|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* return – \w I|strong="G2532"\w* appeal \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* – \w open|strong="G4115"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* hearts \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*?

\w Do|strong="G5101"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* enter \w into|strong="G1096"\w* inconsistent relations \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w those|strong="G1063"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* reject \w the|strong="G2532"\w* faith. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w partnership|strong="G3352"\w* \w can|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w between|strong="G4314"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* lawlessness? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w has|strong="G5101"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*?

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w harmony|strong="G4857"\w* can \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G5547"\w* \w between|strong="G4314"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* Belial? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* can \w those|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* accept \w the|strong="G1161"\w* faith \w have|strong="G5101"\w* \w in|strong="G4314"\w* \w common|strong="G3310"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* reject \w it|strong="G1161"\w*?

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w agreement|strong="G4783"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w between|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w meant|strong="G1510"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* – ‘\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G1704"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* “\w Come|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* nations, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* separate \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G3004"\w*,” \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, “\w And|strong="G2532"\w* touch \w nothing|strong="G3361"\w* impure; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w welcome|strong="G1523"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w*,” \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Ruler \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w*.’
